Act 1..1
classCode 1..1codeclassCode
Required Pattern: ACT
moodCode 1..1codemoodCode
Required Pattern: EVN
templateId 0..*(Slice Definition)Slice: Unordered, Open by value:root
templateId:templateId1 1..1http://hl7.org/fhir/cda/StructureDefinition/IItemplateId
root:templateId1 1..1root
Required Pattern: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.64
code 1..1http://hl7.org/fhir/cda/StructureDefinition/CDcode
code 1..1code
Required Pattern: 48767-8
codeSystem 1..1codeSystem
Required Pattern: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1
text 1..1http://hl7.org/fhir/cda/StructureDefinition/EDtext
reference 1..1reference
value 1..1value
reference/value 1..1reference/value
author 0..1AuthorParticipationauthor

Documentation for this format

name: CommentActivity
title: CommentActivity
description: Comments are free text data that cannot otherwise be recorded using data elements already defined by this specification. They are not to be used to record information that can be recorded elsewhere. For example, a free text description of the severity of an allergic reaction would not be recorded in a comment.

element.definition: Base definition for all elements in a resource.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.
element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: HL7ActClass urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 STATIC) (CONF:81-9425).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: HL7ActMood urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 STATIC) (CONF:81-9426).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:81-9427) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:81-9427) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:81-9428).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:81-9430).
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] authorAuthor Participation (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119) (CONF:81-9433).

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children

element.definition: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: HL7ActClass urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 STATIC) (CONF:81-9425).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: HL7ActMood urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 STATIC) (CONF:81-9426).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:81-9427) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId (CONF:81-9427) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:81-9428).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code="48767-8" Annotation Comment (CONF:81-19159).
This code SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:81-26501).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:81-9430).
This text SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] reference (CONF:81-15967).
This reference SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @value (CONF:81-15968).
This text SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] reference/@value (CONF:81-9431).
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] authorAuthor Participation (identifier: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119) (CONF:81-9433).
